title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t0.0
text: How is AI helping one beauty company spot key trends?

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t6.84
text: Find out on today's episode.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t9.68
text: I'm Stéphane Lénais from L'Oreal and you're listening to Me, Myself and AI.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t17.36
text: Welcome to Me, Myself and AI, a podcast on artificial intelligence and business.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t22.44
text: Each episode, we introduce you to someone innovating with AI.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t26.12
text: I'm Sam Ransbotham, Professor of Analytics at Boston College.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t30.28
text: I'm also the AI and Business Strategy guest editor at MIT Sloan Management Review.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t35.68
text: And I'm Shervin Khodobande, senior partner with BCG,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t39.28
text: and I co-lead BCG's AI practice in North America.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t42.6
text: Together, MIT SMR and BCG have been researching and publishing on AI for six years,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t48.8
text: interviewing hundreds of practitioners and surveying thousands of companies

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t52.8
text: on what it takes to build and to deploy and scale AI capabilities

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t56.8
text: and really transform the way organizations operate.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t62.559999999999995
text: Today, Shervin and I are talking with Stéphane Lanuzelle,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t65.36
text: Beauty Tech Program Director at L'Oreal.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t67.67999999999999
text: Stéphane, thanks for joining us. Welcome.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t69.8
text: Hi, Stéphane.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t71.16
text: Hello. I'm really happy to be talking with you today.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t74.32
text: Let's get started.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t75.44
text: Stéphane, you're at L'Oreal.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t77.47999999999999
text: Can you tell us about your current role?

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t79.28
text: What does a beauty tech program director do?

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t83.12
text: I'm in charge of the beauty tech transformation,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t85.28
text: which is a global transformation of all functions and in all geographies.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t89.88
text: And that adventure, beauty tech, for me started in 2019.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t93.84
text: It was the vision of our CEO at that time, that was Jean-Paul Agoun,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t98.68
text: that was really visionary in the fact that tech will disrupt the beauty industry.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t105.84
text: And he really listened and talked with all the CEOs of the big tech companies,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t112.32000000000001
text: asking them the question on what tech will do to beauty,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t115.76
text: how tech will impact beauty.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t117.64
text: And that's how we've started on that journey,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t120.04
text: saying that we want to be the champion, the leader of beauty tech,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t123.2
text: to be the number one.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t124.08000000000001
text: And because in L'Oreal, we are the leader of the beauty industry,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t127.12
text: so we decided that we wanted to be the leader of the beauty tech.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t130.24
text: And I started with that mission,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t132.2
text: being the beauty tech program director with only these two worlds,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t135.28
text: beauty and tech.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t136.68
text: And basically, the simple motto of beauty tech is to invent the beauty of the future

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t141.68
text: while transforming into a company of the future.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t144.6
text: So what I'm doing every day is inventing the beauty of the future

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t148.96
text: and transforming L'Oreal into a company of the future.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t154.92000000000002
text: Thanks for listening to Me, Myself and AI.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t157.28
text: Our show is able to continue in large part due to listener support.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t160.76
text: Your streams and downloads make a big difference.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t163.48
text: If you have a moment, please consider leaving us an Apple podcast review

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t166.92
text: or a rating on Spotify,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t168.56
text: and share our show with others you think might find it interesting and helpful.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t177.35999999999999
text: What did you learn? How will technology affect beauty?

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t179.64
text: What's going to be the big change?

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t181.72
text: There are two big impacts.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t183.16
text: There are the development of services for consumers,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t187.2
text: but there are also how can we leverage technology

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t190.2
text: to make the life of our employees easier

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t193.16
text: and make them faster and more creative and more nimble.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t196.79999999999998
text: Let's start first with consumers.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t198.6
text: L'Oreal has been around for more than 110 years,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t202.0
text: and we produce 7 billion physical cosmetic products every year.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t206.83999999999997
text: But we are more and more into services.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t209.04
text: And basically, tech is playing a huge part in developing beauty services.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t213.72
text: We have been working a lot on helping consumers through services

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t218.12
text: and through technology to be able to find the right product for them.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t222.24
text: I take some examples.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t223.6
text: We have developed some solutions using AI and computer vision

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t227.24
text: and augmented reality to be able to do virtual try-on of makeup.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t232.88
text: Another example is skin diagnostics to make some recommendations

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t237.08
text: in terms of what are your top concerns

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t239.88
text: and what are the products that you should apply in your daily routine.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t244.08
text: This is how technology is really transforming beauty

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t248.56
text: because we want to develop a beauty that is more and more inclusive,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t253.04000000000002
text: a beauty that is more and more personalized.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t256.12
text: So you've got a varied background in banking and consulting

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t260.48
text: and luxury and consumer goods.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t263.28000000000003
text: Can you tell us a little bit more about what got you to your current role

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t266.6
text: and in particular, what got you interested in artificial intelligence

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t269.88
text: and applying these technologies in your current role?

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t273.12
text: I've been in the beauty industry for 15 years now.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t276.96000000000004
text: So after consulting, I worked for many luxury or cosmetic goods companies.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t282.68
text: I decided to really be part of that industry.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t285.84000000000003
text: And I joined the cosmetic industry first in Shiseido and then in L'Oreal.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t290.8
text: Technology was not that prominent when I graduated a long time ago.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t296.08000000000004
text: But what I've done throughout my career is really looking at

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t300.8
text: how we can make the organization evolve

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t305.64
text: to be able to cope with new trends.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t308.36
text: And obviously, people play a major part into that,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t311.96000000000004
text: the way you add new skills in your organization,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t314.88
text: the way you structure the organization.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t317.48
text: And more and more technology is also playing a key role.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t320.28000000000003
text: And I've always been very curious in looking at how technology was evolving

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t324.56
text: and trying to see in my industry, in the beauty industry,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t329.2
text: what could be the impact, what can I leverage?

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t331.56
text: And I think that's why I'm the head of BeautyTech,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t335.44
text: because I'm really into being curious at technology,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t339.44
text: being a strong believer on transformation

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t343.28
text: and being a strong believer that organization and people can adapt

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t349.03999999999996
text: and can be even better if you give them the incentive

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t352.68
text: and you upskill them in the use of technology.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t355.84
text: So I'm a very optimistic person.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t358.56
text: And I've always seen tech as a force of good for the people,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t362.32
text: good for the planet and really very curious at embracing new technology.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t368.64
text: You mentioned upskilling.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t370.08
text: Do people at L'Oreal need to know anything about artificial intelligence?

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t374.4
text: Yes, they need to know.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t375.88
text: And not only the data scientists of the few people

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t378.92
text: that are really practitioners of artificial intelligence,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t382.84000000000003
text: but everybody.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t383.48
text: And here we've created the Tech and Data University for L'Oreal

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t386.84
text: that is targeting the 88,000 employees.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t389.67999999999995
text: Obviously, we have different programs,

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t391.56
text: some programs more on acculturation

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t395.03999999999996
text: and some programs that are really hardcore, I can say.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t398.28
text: And we do get that request from general management.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t402.56
text: Tell me about artificial intelligence and what I need to know.

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t406.88
text: What I'm saying is that we don't need everybody at L'Oreal

title: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel
id: Inventing the Beauty of the Future - L'Oreal's Stephane Lannuzel-t410.47999999999996
